title: Supreme Court Asked to Review Bill Cosbyâ€™s Overturned Conviction
sub_head: Comedian had been serving 3-to-10-year sentence when freed in June
body:
Prosecutors in Pennsylvania on Monday asked the U.S. Supreme Court to review a state court ruling that had overturned the sexual assault conviction of entertainer Bill Cosby.
Mr. Cosby, 84 years old, was convicted in 2018 of drugging and assaulting Andrea Constand, a former Temple University staff member. He had been serving a three-to-10-year sentence when the Pennsylvania Supreme Court ordered his release in June.
